Class-Cleric 20 -- Male Half-Elf Cleric: 20
Strength: 18 (+4) Dexterity: 18 (+4) Constitution: 18 (+4) Intelligence: 18 (+4) Wisdom: 19 (+4) Charisma: 18 (+4)
Background: Acolyte Alignment: Lawful Good Deity: Abadar (LN)
Experience: 19500/20000 Level: 20 Speed: 25 Size: Medium Encumbered/Maximum Bulk: 9/14
Ability Notes:
Ability Boosts: Ability Boost (Choose 20 from any)
Breath Control: Can hold breath for 225 rd without suffocating

Doctrine: 1 selection
General Feats: 5 selections
Half-Elf: Has the Low-Light Vision feature
Human Heritage: 1 selection

Warpriest: Has the Deadly Simplicity feature
Warpriest: Has the Shield Block feature
Anathema: May not perform acts or cast spells prohibited by Abadar
Low-Light Vision: Has normal vision in dim light

Clever Improviser: May attempt any skill untrained
Cooperative Nature: +4 Aid checks
Incredible Initiative: +2 on initiative rolls
Student Of The Canon: Critical failures on Religion checks to Decipher Writing or Recall Knowledge are normal failures/Failures to Recall Knowledge about own faith are successes, and successes are critical successes
Combat
Hit Points: 268 Armor Class: 39 (dexterity (4 max); expert)
Armor: Leather Shield: Wooden (+2 AC when raised; hardness 3; HP 12) Weapons: Crossbow (+28 1d10 P R120'; dexterity; expert); Dagger (+28 1d4+4 P/S R10'; strength; expert); Staff (+28 1d4+4 B [2h d8]; strength; expert)
Combat Notes:
Armor Proficiency: Defense Trained (Heavy Armor)
Cloistered Cleric: Attack Expert (Crossbow; Simple Weapons; Unarmed Attacks)
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +80
Deadly Simplicity: Crossbow inflicts +1 damage die step
Deity: Attack Trained (Crossbow)
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +4
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +4
Divine Defense: Defense Expert (Unarmored Defense)
Extend Armament Alignment: Has increased Align Armament effects
Strength Attack Adjustment: +4
Toughness: +20 Hit Points
Unconventional Weaponry: Treats Bastard Sword as one category simpler
Warpriest: Defense Expert (Light Armor; Medium Armor)/Attack Trained (Martial Weapons)/Attack Expert (Crossbow; Simple Weapons; Unarmed Attacks)
Align Armament (Lawful): (1) Touched weapon inflicts +1d6 HP lawful for 1 min
Channel Smite: (2) Adds the damage from Heal or Harm to a melee Strike
Cloistered Cleric: Critical hits with a crossbow inflict its critical specialization effect
Incredible Improvisation: (F) Gives +4 on an untrained skill check once per day
Replenishment Of War: Successful Strikes with a crossbow give self 10 temporary Hit Points, or 20 temporary Hit Points on a critical hit, for 1 rd
Shared Replenishment: Can give the temporary Hit Points from Replenishment Of War to any ally within 10'
Shield Block: (R) Raised shield negates damage equal to its hardness; self and shield each suffer any remaining damage
Warpriest: Critical hits with a crossbow inflict its critical specialization effect
Weapon Specialization: Inflicts +2, +3, and +4 HP damage with expert, master, and legendary weapon proficiency
Save: Fortitude: +30 (constitution; master); Reflex: +28 (dexterity; expert); Will: +30 (wisdom; master)
Save Notes:
Cloistered Cleric: Save Expert (Fortitude)
Lightning Reflexes: Save Expert (Reflex)
Resolve: Save Master (Will)
Warpriest: Save Master (Fortitude)
Breath Control: +1 vs. inhaled threats, and successes vs. inhaled threats are critical successes
Fast Recovery: Regains 2x Hit Points and drained severity from rest/Successful Fortitude vs. an ongoing disease or poison reduces its stage by 2, or 1 if virulent; critical success by 3, or 2 if virulent
Haughty Obstinacy: Successful saves vs. mental effects that control actions are critical successes, and foe Intimidation (Coerce) fails are critical fails
Resolve: Successes on Will saves are critical successes
Toughness: -1 DC on recovery checks
Warpriest: Successes on Fortitude saves are critical successes
Magic
Spell Slots: D0: 5; D10: 2; D1: 3; D2: 3; D3: 3; D4: 3; D5: 3; D6: 3; D7: 3; D8: 3; D9: 3 Focus Points: 2 Attack: Divine: +32 (wisdom; legendary) Spell DC: Divine: 42 (wisdom; legendary)
Spells:
Agile Feet (D1 Tra): (1) Self gains +5 Speed and may ignore difficult terrain for the remainder of turn
Harm (D1 Nec): (1) (1) Touched suffers 1d10 HP negative, (2) R30' target suffers 1d10 HP negative, or (3) 30' emanation inflicts 1d10 HP negative; undead regain 1d10 HP, +8 HP for (2) (heightened +1 inflicts or restores +1d10 HP and +8 HP for (2))
Heal (D1 Nec): (1) Touched regains 1d10 HP, (2) R30' target regains 1d10+8 HP, or (3) 30' emanation restores 1d10 HP; undead suffer 1d10 HP positive (save basic Fortitude) (heightened +1 restores or inflicts +1d10 HP and +8 HP for (2))
Traveler's Transit (D4 Evo): (2) Self gains choice of climb or swim Speed equal to Speed for 1 min (heightened 5th self may choose to gain fly speed)
Magic Notes:
Advanced Domain (Travel): Knows the Traveler's Transit divine spell/+1 Focus Points
Cloistered Cleric: Spell Legendary (Divine)
Domain Initiate (Travel): Knows the Agile Feet divine spell/Has a focus pool and 1 Focus Point
Harming Hands: Increases Harm die type to d10
Healing Hands: Increases Heal die type to d10
Maker Of Miracles: +1 10th level spell slot
Miraculous Spell: Has 1 10th-level spell slot
Warpriest: Spell Master (Divine)
Avatar's Audience: Can speak for Abadar, conduct the Commune ritual to contact Abadar without cost, and use Plane Shift to travel to Abadar's realm once per day
Cantrip Expansion: Can prepare two additional cantrips each day or add two additional cantrips to repertoire
Cast Down: (1) Subsequent Harm or Heal also inflicts knocked prone, and target critical failure also inflicts -10 Speed for 1 min
Castigating Weapon: Damaging a fiend with Heal causes weapons and unarmed Strikes to inflict bonus good damage vs. fiends equal to half the spell level for 1 rd
Channeled Succor: Can cast Remove Curse, Remove Disease, Remove Paralysis, or Restoration in place of a prepared Heal
Command Undead: (1) Harm controls target undead up to level 17 for 1 min (Will negates; critical failure extends to 1 hr)
Communal Healing: Casting Heal on another creature restores Hit Points to self equal to the spell level
Cremate Undead: Heal cast upon undead also inflicts persistent fire damage equal to the spell level
Defensive Recovery: (1) Subsequent Heal cast on a single target also gives +2 Armor Class and saves for 1 rd
Deity's Protection: Casting a domain spell gives self resistance equal to the spell level to all damage for 1 rd
Deity: Has access to Illusory Object, Creation, and Magnificent Mansion spells
Directed Channel: Can direct the effects of an area Harm or Heal into a 60' cone
Divine Spellcasting: Can learn spells from the divine tradition
Divine Weapon: (F) Using a divine spell slot causes a wielded weapon to inflict +1d4 HP force or +1d6 HP alignment for the remainder of the turn once per turn
Domain Focus: Refocus restores 2 Focus Points
Domain Wellspring: Refocus restores 3 Focus Points
Echoing Channel: (1) Subsequent 2-action Harm or Heal cast on a single target also causes 1-action effects on an adjacent creature
Emblazon Antimagic: Can use Emblazon Armament to cause a shield to give a save bonus vs. magic and Shield Block vs. spells, or to cause a critical hit with a weapon to allow a counteract attempt vs. a spell using 1/2 the wielder's level
Emblazon Armament: 10 min process gives a shield +1 Hardness or a weapon +1 HP damage
Emblazon Energy: Can use Emblazon Armament to cause a shield to give a save bonus and Shield Block vs. a chosen energy type (plus resistance 10 with a matching domain spell), or to cause a weapon to inflict +1d4 HP energy type damage (or +1d6 HP with a matching domain spell)
Eternal Bane: R15' Aura gives continuous level 10 Bane effects
Eternal Blessing: R15' Aura gives continuous level 10 Bless effects
Fast Channel: Can use 2 actions to cast a 3-action Harm or Heal
Harmful Font: Can cast Harm at level 10 an additional 5 times per day
Healing Font: Can cast Heal at level 10 an additional 5 times per day
Heroic Recovery: (1) Subsequent Heal cast on a single target also gives +5 Speed, +1 attack, and +1 HP damage for 1 rd
Holy Castigation: Can use Heal to damage fiends
Improved Command Undead: Command Undead gives control of target for 1 rd, 10 min, or 24 hr on save success, failure, or critical failure
Improved Communal Healing: Can give the additional Hit Points from Communal Healing to another within range of the spell
Improved Swift Banishment: Can sacrifice any 5th level or higher prepared spell to inflict Swift Banishment with a -2 save penalty
Metamagic Channel: (F) Applies a 1-action metamagic action to Harm or Heal
Necrotic Infusion: (1) Subsequent Harm cast on an undead causes the target to inflict +1d6 negative HP (5th level spell +2d6 HP; 8th level +3d6 HP) with first melee Strike in the next rd
Reach Spell: (1) Extends subsequent spell range by 30'
Resurrectionist: Restoring Hit Points to a dying or dead target also gives fast healing 5 for 1 min or until the target is knocked unconscious
Sap Life: Casting Harm on another creature restores Hit Points to self equal to the spell level
Selective Energy: Can choose 4 creatures to be unaffected when casting an area Harm or Heal
Steady Spellcasting: Successful DC 15 flat check negates spellcasting disruption
Swift Banishment: (R) Immediately casts Banishment after a critical hit on an extraplanar foe
Turn Undead: Critical failure by undead up to level 20 damaged by Heal inflicts fleeing for 1 rd
Versatile Font: Can use a font for either Harm or Heal
Notes
Validation Errors:
Class Feats Allocation: 11 available vs. 46 allocated
Cleric Divine Font Allocation: 1 available vs. 2 allocated
Cleric Doctrine Allocation: 1 available vs. 2 allocated
Command Undead Feat: Requires level (currently 20) >= 4, harmful font feature (currently 1) and alignment (currently Lawful Good) matches 'Evil'
Eternal Bane Feat: Requires level (currently 20) >= 16 and alignment (currently Lawful Good) matches 'Evil'
Improved Command Undead Feat: Requires level (currently 20) >= 10, harmful font feature (currently 1), command undead feature (currently 1) and alignment (currently Lawful Good) matches 'Evil'
Necrotic Infusion Feat: Requires level (currently 20) >= 4, harmful font feature (currently 1) and alignment (currently Lawful Good) matches 'Evil'
